meanings.definition: Very fashionable or up-to-date in style or influence.
meanings.sent1: The new jacket is so trendy.
meanings.sent2: She always wears trendy clothes to school.
meanings.sent3: Everyone wanted to sit with the trendy girl at lunch.
meanings.sent4: Her trendy sense of style shines like a beacon in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The trendy outfit made her stand out at the party.

meanings.definition: A person who is very fashionable or up-to-date in style or influence.
meanings.sent1: The trendy at the party caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: He became a trendy after appearing in the fashion magazine.
meanings.sent3: The trendy was like a celebrity among the group.
meanings.sent4: She was the trendy of the school, always setting new fashion trends.
meanings.sent5: Being a trendy requires keeping up with the latest styles.
